name: ReviewsTap
author: ReviewsTap

sections.description:
Reviews Tap helps businesses collect, monitor and manage reviews across a range of online platforms.

General Features

  • Automatically request a rating from new subscribers
  • Bulk request ratings from existing subscribers
  • Display reviews on website through shortcode or Widget

WooCommerce Features

  • Automatically request a rating from new customers
  • Bulk request ratings from existing customers

Supported Review Sources

  • Google Local Business
  • Facebook Recomendations
  • Tripadvisor
  • Yelp (Coming Soon)
  • Capterra (Coming Soon)
  • Wongnai (Coming Soon)
sections.installation:
1. Unzip reviewstap.zip and upload the folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add Your Reviewstap API key on the Settings page
sections.faq:
Who should install our plugin

This plugin only works for users of ReviewsTap, sign up free at https://www.reviewstap.com/
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

Support woocommerce completed orders as well as customers

1.0.8

Updated widget display

1.0.3

Added Shortcode & Widgets

1.0.0

Initial Version

short_description: ReviewsTap helps small businesses collect, monitor and manage reviews across a range of online platforms.
